page.title: 16EMERSON COLLEGE-PHILOSOPHY
page.content: By our "normal" standards, Emerson College has a very unconventional app- roach to learning. The college uses Anthroposophy so that students "can recapture and re-affirm the faith, hope and charity of heart that lives deep in every human soul in the face of unfaith, despair, and hate that possesses the world".(L.Francis Edmunds -founder).Each topic studied has 3 main goals 1) to overcome materialistic thinking 2)to strive towards the all-human being 3)to over come the over-specialisation which diminishes Man's stature.The work of the college is inspired by the work of Rudolf Steiner who emphasized a "greater awareness of our humanity".
